comments.body: I find it annoying how this message always comes up even when the two declarations donâ€™t merge (without errors)... just feels like misleading noise. Not related to this PR, though, it happens in a lot of nonsense places (#36237)

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +16,20 @@!!! error TS2440: Import declaration conflicts with local declaration of 'EnumA'.
           ~~~~~
!!! error TS2395: Individual declarations in merged declaration 'EnumA' must be all exported or all local.
    
    export type EnumA = [string] | [string, number];
